phrs.translation: 突触后拟箭毒神经毒素
肉毒杆菌神经毒素, 肉毒神经毒素, 神经毒素

sentences.sentence: Many dinoflagellates are harmless, but some produce neurotoxins.
sentences.translation: 很多鞭毛藻是无害的，但是有些会产生神经毒素。

sentences.sentence: Such immersion is accompanied by mind-altering neurotoxins which keep the victim docile.
sentences.translation: 这种过程中，同时有能改变大脑的神经毒素使牺牲者更加听话。

sentences.sentence: I believe it is absent because it is being coupled to toxins - neurotoxins, probably xenobiotics, because B-12 couples to nitrogen.
sentences.translation: 我相信它是缺席，因为它被加上毒素-神经毒素，可能是外来物质，因为B - 12的夫妇氮。
